column4: Where can I get a list of installed packages available on the Ubuntu live DVD?
The live DVD contains all those packages?
it fits on a CD, so it's really a live CD
There is a live DVD. I want the list of packages on the live DVD.
I don't know. I'm the one asking.
So I'm assuming that your DVD is ubuntu-standard
There are many different metapackages (ie remixes)
I don't know which one you have. Presumably you have ubuntu-standard
Is a list available somewhere of the different variations?
at that link I gave you, right hand side at the bottom
